member.name: ID3D11Linker.AddClipPlaneFromCBuffer
member.summary: Adds a clip plane with the plane coefficients taken from a cbuffer entry for 10Level9 shaders.
member.returns: Returns S_OK if successful; otherwise, returns one of the Direct3D 11 Return Codes.

member.name: ID3D11Linker.Link
member.summary: Links the shader and produces a shader blob that the Direct3D runtime can use.
member.param: A pointer to the interface for the shader module instance to link from.
The name of the shader module instance to link from.
The name for the shader blob that is produced.
A pointer to a variable that receives a pointer to the ID3DBlob interface that you can use to access the compiled shader code.
A pointer to a variable that receives a pointer to the ID3DBlob interface that you can use to access compiler error messages.
member.returns: Returns S_OK if successful; otherwise, returns one of the Direct3D 11 Return Codes.

member.name: ID3D11Linker.UseLibrary
member.summary: Adds an instance of a library module to be used for linking.
member.param: A pointer to the interface for the library module instance.
member.returns: Returns S_OK if successful; otherwise, returns one of the Direct3D 11 Return Codes.

summary.para:
A linker interface is used to link a shader module.
Note This interface is part of the HLSL shader linking technology that you can use on all Direct3D 11 platforms to create precompiled HLSL functions, package them into libraries, and link them into full shaders at run time.
